text: Sukhjit Kaur Sahi is an Indian politician and member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. Sahi is a member of the Punjab Legislative Assembly from the Dasuya constituency in Hoshiarpur district.MLA report card: Rajnish Kumar Babbi and Sukhjit Kaur SahiSukhjeet Kaur Sahi sworn in as MLA in the presence of CMSahi's wife Sukhjeet Kaur declared BJP Candidate for Dasuya She is the wife of Amarjit Singh Sahi.She has a son named Harsimrat Singh Sahi and a daughter named Yasmeen who is married to a lawyer named Sidak Sandhu. == References == Category:People from Hoshiarpur district Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Punjab Category:Members of the Punjab Legislative Assembly Category:Living people Category:21st-century Indian politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sukhjit Kaur Sahi
